sibling_1: ^Ulric: The Apprentice tilts his head quizzically as he bows. "Greetings, Prince. Is something the matter?"

c-0: ^Luke (You): "What do you even do around here? I never see you do anything!" ^Ulric: "W- well I… I do whatever it is I am needed to do, of course! I simply follow Lady Mathilde’s guidance!" The Apprentice steadies himself with a deep breath. "If you are to become King one day, then you must start paying attention to these things." ^Luke (You): "Don't lecture me! I'm not a child!?" ^Ulric: "You’re right, I’m sorry… I mean no offense. Perhaps it’s just best for the two of us to talk some other time, Your Highness."
c-1: end

bsf_1: ^Ulric: "Uhh… hello there? Is there something you need…?"

c-0: ^Nicola (You): "I was hoping to speak to someone about what happened." ^Ulric: He scans you disbelievingly for a moment. "M-me? But why me...?" He steps a bit closer to you. "Sorry, I don't mean to seem unwilling. It's just that I didn't expect that is all." ^Nicola (You): "This is all just so much. I'm having a hard time piecing things together." ^Ulric: He remains quiet for a moment, watching you closely as the gears turn in his mind. "From what I understand, you were close to her correct?" ^Nicola (You): "Yes, she was the best friend I ever had." ^Ulric: "Even as someone who didn't know her, she seemed like a great person. It seems like you chose a great best friend."
c-1: ^Nicola (You): "Don't you ever leave that hag's side?" ^Ulric: The Apprentice’s head recoils back and he crosses his arms defensively. "W- what? I… Well, no, as a matter of fact, I don’t! She is a great instructor! Now just leave me alone!" He turns his head away from you.

king_1: ^Ulric: "Your Majesty!" The Apprentice bows deeply, his voice quivering slightly. "I am graced by your presence, my Lord!"

c-0: ^King Alphred (You): "Ulric, was it? How are you holding up?" ^Ulric: The Apprentice sighs deeply. "Not well, I'm afraid. I didn't know her personally, but I knew that she was a great painter and a lovely soul. I wish that I could have known her better... I am deeply sorry for your loss, sir." His eyes glisten softly from the narrow slits of his mask. ^King Alphred (You): "Really...? You mean that?" ^Ulric: "Y-yes sir! Absolutely, every word!"
c-1: ^King Alphred (You): "Remind me of your duties to Lady Mathilde." ^Ulric: A shiver runs through the Apprentice, and he clasps his hands together. "I am Lady Mathilde’s personal assistant and apprentice, sir. I manage her personal finances and other such affairs, while she focuses on the war. I hope to study under her so that I may be considered for such a position in the far future."
c-2:
^King Alphred (You): "Speak candidly: How does Lady Mathilde treat you?"

^Ulric: "Lady Mathilde...?" <i> The Apprentice takes a deep breath. "She is... demanding, but fair. I am expected to folow her every command, and to be present at all times. Everything I know, I've learned from her, Your Majesty."

advisor_1: ^Ulric: The Apprentice watches attentively as he quickly bows his head. "Yes, Lady Mathilde?"

c-0: ^Mathilde (You): What are your thoughts on the King? ^Ulric: "The King...?" The Apprentice thinks for a moment, never taking his eyes off of you. "He’s a strong but compassionate ruler. I know that the death of the Princess has broken him in some way. I can see it in his eyes, the way they’re almost… looking for something, for her." He shivers once as if suddenly cold, then goes quiet. ^Ulric: "..." ^Ulric: "Was there anything else, Master?"
c-1: end

c-0: ^Mathilde (You): What are your thoughts on the King's son? ^Ulric: "You mean Prince Luke?" The Apprentice thinks for a moment, never taking his eyes off of you. "He seems like he can be very short-tempered and definitely not ready to be a King." He quickly goes quiet, searching to see if the King may have overheard nearby. ^Mathilde (You): Would I not be a much better choice of an heir than Prince Luke? ^Ulric: "..." Ulric carefully moves close enough to whisper into your ear ^Ulric: He whispers, "Master... We should not discuss this here; it could lead to very bad reprecussions if we get caught."
c-1: ^Mathilde (You): What are your thoughts on the King? ^Ulric: "The King...?" The Apprentice thinks for a moment, never taking his eyes off of you. "He’s a strong but compassionate ruler. c-1: ^King Alphred (You): "Did you happen to see where my daughter went before the incident occurred?" ^Ulric: "Sorry my lord, I cannot recall when I last saw her that night. I believe it was too long ago for me to fully remember." ^King Alphred (You): "Are you sure you did not see anything when you and Lady Mathilde left the party?" ^Ulric: He noticeably tenses up a bit"The only notable thing I can remember is... oh, right! The couple who left on a rural road that the Princess and Prince we're both- I MEAN-" His abrupt pause feels like a minute. "I'm so sorry sir, I must talk to Lady Mathilde. I wlll speak to you later."

c-0: ^Mathilde (You): "So... where were you that night, Ulric?" ^Ulric: "T- that’s a very odd question, Master. I was right by your side, of course!" The apprentice shifts uncomfortably. "If you’re asking where I got the wine… I snagged it after the Princess and Nicola left it behind." He admits dejectedly ^Mathilde (You): "Where did they go afterward?" ^Ulric: "I don't know. I didn't follow them..."
